protocol.text: The seeds were spread on 0.7 % (w/v) micro agar containing half-strength Murashige and Skoog medium in a 9-cm petri dish stratified at 4 C in the dark for overnight.

After the stratification, the dish was then removed to specified dark (22 C) and light (22 C under a mixture of cool white and GRO-LUX fluorescent lights in 3:2 ratio with average light intensity of 60 mole m-2 s-1 and 16-h diurnal photoperiod) periods.

cDNA was synthesised from 6.6 ug total RNA in accordance with the prescribed Affymetrix protocal. Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol using Enzo BioArray High Yield RNA Transcript Labelling Kit.
Concert Plant RNA Reagent (Invitrogen, Paisley, UK) using the manufacturerâ€™s large-scale isolation protocol.
